Articles.Content:
I jump on the bag, it pops, territories scattered throughout the universe.

I claim the only hill-shaped one.

My hill!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-07T20:19:11Z" title="12/07/2016 08:19  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 7, 2016</time> by Xorth Tanovar**

i use every singe stupid idea every kerbal player has ever thought of, strap them to a 7Km long pole full of sepatrons, and fire at the hill

my hill

I hack your computer and edit your game files so the hill is mine. I capture you soliders.

My Hill, my soliders

I blow up you planet with the Death Star.

My Death Star.

I shoot your death star with an interplanetary missile.

I have now inhabited my own planet, which no one knows about as it is uncharitable.

My planet

The Enterprise comes and absorbs your planet into the Federation.

My Federation.

Psi-Cop Alfred Bester shows up, bends your mind to my will, and you hand your puny Federation over to me.

my Earth Alliance!

I request to join this alliance.

My planet turned out to be a decoy, and I'm safe on my own little rock in the <redacted>.
</redacted>

I destroy Planet <redacted> in Sector <redacted> with Star-killer Base.
</redacted></redacted>

![500?cb=20160114003557](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/47/Starkiller_Base.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/500?cb=20160114003557)

My Star-killer Base.

I destroy one of those cooler reactor things.

After checking the planet in <redacted> in <redacted> next to the <redacted> System, I have realized that you missed my planet by <redacted> <redacted>.
</redacted></redacted></redacted></redacted></redacted>

#Censorship

#Censorship.

My hashtag.

#StopTheHashtags

My Ad

all advertisement is destroyed

nobody's ads

I take the ads

my ads

I burn the ads.

My fire.

I pee on your fire.

My ashen puddle!

Wow my empire still stands! All of you are still trapped in your own corner of reality that you can't escape.

My Empire

...and what an empire it is, the entire padded interior of a 10x10 room, you inside, and the door locked from the outside. Visiting hours 10a-6p, strictly supervised.

My hill.

My multiple planets continue to grow as my star-fleet conquers more and more planets.

My galactic reign.

Your galactic reign fits nicely in the palm of my hands...

![04aff97b6b3444a0f72e281617759de1.jpg](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/04/af/f9/04aff97b6b3444a0f72e281617759de1.jpg)

My universal domain!

I have a piece of cosmic Lego. When you step on it, I use the distraction to build myself a hill.

My hill.

You trip on a cosmic Lincoln Log and fall off the hill.

My hill!

I summon Garrus. I give him a sniper rifle. He shoots you. You die.

My turian controlled hill.

Garrus actually hates Dark Junior and simply leaves, giving me free control of the hill.

My Hill i named Quasinox!

Luckily for me they come up with a cure for my mental illness so i can reclaim my Empire.

And it has grown!

And I Joined the commonwealth.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-13T16:30:15Z" title="12/13/2016 04:30  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 13, 2016</time> by ThaZeus**
